Business WebsiteGamezopTerms of UsePrivacy PolicyCookie PolicyTerms Of UseLast updated on 23 February 2021Hello and welcome to the Terms of Use (“Terms”) of Advergame Technologies Pvt. Ltd., a private limited company incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013 with its registered office at L-29, First Floor, Outer Circle, Connaught Place, New Delhi – 110 001 (“Gamezop”, “We”, ”Us”, or “Our”). Gamezop syndicates and develops HTML5 games for websites and mobile applications. These games are either created by Gamezop or independent developers who sell/license their HTML5 games to Gamezop.By accessing or using the Platform (defined below) You agree to be bound by these Terms. Your agreement with us includes these Terms, the Privacy Policy, and the Cookie Policy (collectively “Agreement”).If you do not agree with these terms, then please refrain from using the platform. By accessing or using the platform, you irrevocably accept the agreement and agree to abide by the same (as updated from time to time).
  1. DEFINITIONS
    1. “Contest” is an event in which Contestants compete to score the highest points in the Games hosted by Gamezop on their Platform. Contest can be either ‘Paid’ or ‘Free-to-play’. Paid Contests will require the Contestant to pay an entry fee to participate. Free-to-play Contests do not require the Contestants to pay an entry fee to participate.
    2. “Contestant” is a User (defined below) who meets the Contestant Eligibility Criteria as detailed in Clause 5.1 (below) and participates in Contests that are hosted by Gamezop on their Platform.
    3. “Currencies” means the Deposits and Winnings collectively.
    4. “Deposits” is the amount added by the Contestant to his / her Account on the Platform through his / her Paytm e-wallet / net bank / debit card / credit card. The Deposit conversion ratio is INR 1/- (Rupees One Only) = 1 (one) Deposit. Gamezop may at its sole discretion, on performance of identified tasks and activities on the Platform, provide Contestants Deposits in the form of awards. Deposits are disallowed on Websites if Websites open within a third-party application downloaded from Google Play Store.
    5. “Games” shall mean the HTML5 games that are licensed / bought / owned / developed by Gamezop and made available to Users on the Platform.
    6. “Personal Information” means any information that relates to a natural person, which, either directly or indirectly, in combination with other information available or likely to be available with a body corporate, is capable of identifying such person.
    7. “Platform” means the website available at https://www.gamezop.com/and any subdomains (“Websites”) and all Gamezop mobile applications (“Applications”).
    8. “Token” is an award that may be given to a Contestant at Gamezop’s sole discretion. It entitles the Contestant for a discount while participating in a Contest. The representative value of Token is only notional, merely for the purpose of computing discounts.
    9. “User(s)”, “You”, “Your”, or “Yourself” refers to any person who meets the User Eligibility Criteria as detailed in Clause 3 (below). For clarity, a User becomes a Contestant when he / she meets with the Contestant Eligibility Criteria as detailed in Clause 5.1 (below) and creates a Contestant Account.
    10. “Winnings” is an award, subject to the Rules (defined below) of the relevant Contest, given to a Contestant for being one of the top scorers in a particular Contest.
  2. PARTIES TO THE AGREEMENTThese Terms describe a contractual agreement between the User of the Platform and Gamezop regarding the User’s use of the Platform. Gamezop has the right to refuse access in its sole discretion for any or no reason. Without limiting the foregoing, the User specifically acknowledges that Gamezop reserves the right to terminate or limit the User’s access to the Platform if Gamezop determines, in its sole discretion, that the User has violated the Agreement, Rules, or any other guideline by Gamezop, as maybe updated from time to time, including any activities that adversely affect the experience of other Users.
  3. USER ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA
    1. You must be at least 18 years of age to access and use the Gamezop Platform;
    2. You must agree to be bound by these Terms. and
    3. You must be a resident of India
      4. If You do not meet any or all of these criteria, please DO NOT use the Gamezop Platform.
  4. GENERAL DISCLAIMERS
    1. By use of the Platform, You agree that You meet with the Eligibility Criteria as detailed in Clause 3 (above) and that You are fully able and competent to understand and accept this Agreement as a binding contract and to abide by these Terms.
    2. You shall not access the Platform by any other means other than through the interfaces that are provided by Gamezop.
    3. You shall not acquire, copy, or monitor any portion of the Platform in any way to reproduce or circumvent the navigational structure or presentation of the Platform, to obtain or attempt to obtain any materials, documents, or information through any means not specifically made available through the Platform.
    4. You shall not falsify or delete any author attributions, legal or other notices, proprietary designations, labels of the origin or source of software, or other material on the Platform.
    5. You shall not host, display, upload, modify, publish, or share any information on the Platform that:
      1. belongs to another person to which You do not have any right to. or
      2. is harmful, blasphemous, defamatory, obscene, pornographic, pedophilic, libelous, invasive of another’s privacy, hateful, racially objectionable, disparaging, relating to encouraging money laundering or gambling or otherwise unlawful in any manner. or
      3. engages in any activity that interferes with or disrupts access to the Platform or Gamezop servers / networks.
    6. Gamezop shall not be liable for any misuse of the Personal Information shared by You with Us. or through Your profile. or with a third party on the Platform, chat rooms, forums, or comments.
    7. Gamezop reserves the right to change these Terms from time to time, and such changes will be applicable to You if You continue to use the Platform at any time after such changes are posted on the Platform. Where We believe that any changes are material, We will notify You through either an in-app notification, or SMS, or push notifications, or email. Regardless of whether You receive such notice, the changes will be effective, from the time such changes are published on this page. We recommend that you visit this page periodically to be sure You are aware of the most recent Terms.
    8. You expressly authorize Gamezop to send service-related transactional SMS messages and to telephonically contact You (and consent to receive such messages and telephonic calls). This would also apply when Your number is listed as Do Not Disturb (DND), under appropriate guidelines, with the Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (TRAI) and / or the telecom operator providing its services to You.
    9. If You do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Platform, and if You do not wish to agree to any changes to these Terms, please cease using the Platform.
  5. CONTEST TERMS AND CONDITIONSGamezop may organize Contests on the Platform, and to participate in such Contests, the Users need to be in compliance with these Terms, this Clause 5, Rules (defined below) and any additional criteria shared on the Platform.The following terms and conditions govern the Contestant’s participation in the Contests hosted by Gamezop on its Platform. Each Contest may have its own set of rules (“Rules”) and in the event of any conflict between these Terms and the Rules of the relevant Contest, the Rules of the relevant Contest shall prevail.
    1. CONTESTANT ELIGIBILITY CRITERIAYou need to fulfil each of the following eligibility criterion to participate in a Contest:
      1. You must be at least 18 years of age or above to participate in any Contest;
      2. You must be an individual, legal resident of the Republic of India, residing anywhere in India except the States of Andhra Pradesh, Assam, Nagaland, Odisha, Sikkim, Tamil Nadu, and Telangana (“States with Limitation”);
      3. You should have a valid billing address within the territory of India, other than in the States with Limitation;
      4. You need to have a registered Paytm e-wallet (other than in the States with Limitations) linked to your Account (defined below);
      5. You are not restricted by limited capacity;
      6. You are not a compulsive player;
      7. You are not depositing money originating from crime and / or illegal / unauthorized activities into Your Account (defined below). and
      8. You are not using Your Account (defined below) to conduct any criminal / illegal activities.
      2. Gamezop employees and their immediate family members (spouses, domestic partners, parents, grandparents, siblings, children, and grandchildren) are not eligible to participate in Contests.
    2. CONTESTANT ACCOUNT
      1. To participate in a Contest, You must provide Your mobile phone number which is linked to Your Paytm e-wallet. The mobile phone number shared by You, will be verified by Gamezop using a One Time Password (“OTP”). Upon You successfully verifying the mobile phone number, an account will be created for You (“Account”). Your Account is for Your personal use only. You may not impersonate anyone else. Each time You log into the Account with Your registered mobile phone number and verify it using an OTP, You confirm the acceptance of these Terms. Further, You shall not assign Your rights and responsibilities pursuant to the Agreement to any third party.
      2. By registering for an Account, You represent, warrant, and agree that:
        1. You meet with the Contestant Eligibility Criteria as detailed in Clause 5.1 (above);
        2. You are using Your legal name, legally valid identification, and mobile phone number registered in Your own name;
        3. You will provide only true, accurate, current, and complete information about Yourself on the Platform. and
        4. You will maintain and promptly update the information that You provide on the Platform to keep it true, accurate, current, and complete.
      3. In the course of Your use of the Platform, You may be asked to provide certain Personal Information to Gamezop. Gamezop’s information collection and use policies are set forth in the Privacy Policy
      4. You further agree that You will be solely responsible for managing and updating Your information on the Account and for the security of Your Account.
      5. You also agree that You will be solely responsible for any activities conducted on or through Your Account regardless of whether or not You are the individual who undertakes such activities. This includes any unauthorized access and / or use of Your Account.
      6. Gamezop reserves the right to deny or revoke Your access to the Platform, or deactivate Your Account completely, or any part thereof, at any time in its sole discretion, with or without cause.
      7. If You wish to discontinue using Your Account, or if You become aware of any loss, theft, or unauthorized use of Your Account, please notify Gamezop immediately by sending an e-mail to help@gamezop.com.
      8. You release and hold harmless Gamezop from any and all claims and causes of action arising out of or resulting from a third party’s unauthorized access or use of Your Account.
        If You are dissatisfied with the Platform, Your sole remedy is to discontinue using the Platform.
    3. CONTEST DISCLAIMERS
      1. The user must meet with the eligibility criteria as detailed in clause 5.1. The games are based on skill and not chance.
      2. Only indian citizens, residing in india except in the states with limitations are eligible to participate in the contests. If you are not residing in the territory of india or you are residing in the states with limitations please do not sign up for the contests.
      3. Any unapplied amount received by gamezop as deposits shall be refundable as provided in clause 6.3.
      4. The contestants may use the currencies in their account to enter the contests running on the platform, where the maximum participation limit has not been reached.
      5. In the event where the total contribution from contestants in a contest towards the distributable pool remains less than the actual distributions to be done for such contest, gamezop may contribute in the said pool to the extent of such shortfall (between the actual distribution to be done and contributions by the contestants) and bear its cost as promotional expenditure.
      6. Contestants requiring information on tax or legal issues are recommended to contact a tax advisor or the relevant authorities in india.
    4. CHARGES
      1. The Contestant shall be solely responsible and liable for all charges that Paytm may debit for the transfer of monies between the Contestant’s Paytm e-wallet and the Platform (“Transaction Charges”).
      2. The Contestant gives his / her consent to direct debiting of the Contestant’s Paytm ewallet for any Transaction Charges. For promotional purposes, Gamezop may bear these Transaction Charges from time to time. However, such an event will not constitute a waiver of any subsequent Transaction Charges.
    5. WINNINGS, DEPOSITS, AND TOKENS
      1. Purchase – Contestants may purchase Deposit through their Paytm e-wallet. Any Deposit to the Account of a Contestant is refundable until applied for any activity on the Gamezop platform as provided in Clause 6.3;
      2. Fee – the Deposit and Winnings may be used as entry fee for the paid Contests. There may be certain paid Contests which may allow for part payment of the entry fee Tokens (in the form of discounts) and the remainder of the entry fee for such Contests would have to be paid from the Deposit / Winnings. The Contestant may also be required to contribute towards the prize / award for Winnings in the game. The contribution towards the awards of the game shall be paid through Deposits and Winnings only. Such contribution shall be held by Gamezop in fiduciary capacity and shall be paid to the winners of the game as per the game scheme as Winnings;
      3. Awards – Awards for all Contests shall be declared in the Rules of such Contest. All awards are either in the form of Winnings, Deposits, or Tokens. Gamezop at its sole discretion reserves the right to provide Contestants Deposits or Tokens in the form of awards for performing identified tasks and activities on the Platform. such as, referring the Platform to potential users, uploading profile photos, etc.;
      4. Withdrawal – Only unapplied Deposits and Winnings alone may be withdrawn by the Contestant from his / her Account to his / her respective Paytm e-wallet linked to the Account;
      5. Expiry – Tokens which entitle the Contestants a discount may expire based on the validity provided therein;
    6. CONTESTANT OBLIGATIONSContestant shall:
      1. Personally perform all actions in regard to the Account and all payments to the Account shall be made solely for the benefit of the Contestant;
      2. Ensure that he / she is compliant with the terms of any third-party service provider facilitating the payments;
      3. Not be entitled to Currencies and Tokens obtained through cheating or other breaches of the relevant Contest Rules on the Platform, the Agreement, criminal activities, the manipulation of the gaming system, or by any other inappropriate means (“Cheating”);
      4. Not pledge the Currencies or Tokens in the Contestant’s Account;
      5. Be solely liable for all direct taxes under applicable and statutory laws, in connection with the encashment of Currencies by the Contestant. The reward may be subject to withholding taxes and / or other levies, cess, etc. as per applicable law.
    7. GAMEZOP’S RIGHTSGamezop shall:
      1. Reserve the right to change the accepted method of adding or withdrawing Currencies at its sole discretion;
      2. Not warrant that the method of payment is available at all times;
      3. Monitor all accounts and / or money transactions to prevent money laundering activities. Any suspicious activity may be reported to the relevant authorities;
      4. Reserve the right to verify the entitlement of the Contestant and, in case of doubt, may withhold the payment of the Currencies;
      5. Not be liable to pay any interest on any balance amounts of Currencies held in Contestant’s Account on the Platform for any period of time;
      6. Accept a minimum Deposit amount of INR 1/- (Rupees One only). Gamezop reserves the right to amend the limit or arrange for additional and repeated examinations on Deposits at its sole discretion;
      7. Reserve the right to: (i) limit Contestant’s participation in the Contests. and/or (ii) withhold any Currencies in the Contestant’s Account for a time period decided by Gamezop if such Contestant is suspected of Cheating. and
      8. Not be responsible for any damages that could occur as a direct or indirect result of a delay or inability to facilitate addition or withdrawal of the Currencies.
    8. TERMINATION / SUSPENSION OF THE CONTESTANT ACCOUNT BY THE CONTESTANT The Contestant may at his / her will terminate or suspend his / her Account by sending an email to help@gamezop.com. All Currencies in such terminated Account shall stand forfeited by the Contestant unless the Contestant is able to withdraw the Currencies in accordance with these Terms. In the event of suspension of an Account, the Currencies shall be frozen and held in the Account for a period of 6 (six) months. If the Contestant fails to reactivate his / her account within the stipulated timeline, the Currencies in his/her Account shall be deemed forfeited.
    9. CONTEST ENTRY RECEIPTSGamezop does not issue receipts for any Currencies used to participate in the Contests. All Currencies are accounted within the Contestant’s Account on the Platform. It is the responsibility of the Contestant to ensure that the entries are accurate. The Contestant may report any inaccuracies to help@gamezop.com.
    10. GAMEZOP BAZAARContestants may redeem their Winnings and Tokens for merchandise on Gamezop Bazaar within the Platform as per the instructions on Gamezop Bazaar.
      For clarity, the merchandise available on Gamezop Bazaar are not owned by Gamezop. Subject to Contestants fulfilling conditions as defined on Gamezop Bazaar, Gamezop will facilitate the Contestants’ request for merchandise by placing corresponding orders on behalf of the Contestant with third-party sellers of such merchandise. The merchandise will be delivered to the Contestants by the seller of the merchandise in accordance with the terms and conditions of such seller applicable to such transaction and the merchandise will be invoiced to the Contestants as the purchasers of the merchandise and not Gamezop.
    11. COMPLAINTSIf any Contestant does not receive Currencies in spite of being one of the winners in accordance with the Rules of the relevant Contest, or if a Contestant’s request to encash Winnings to his / her Paytm e-wallet fails, such Contestant is required to write an email to help@gamezop.com within 30 (thirty) days from the date on which such Currencies were due to be credited in the Contestant’s Account or encashed to the Contestant’s Paytm e-wallet. Failure to report the same within the stipulated timeline shall result in the Contestant losing his / her claim and forfeiting of such Currencies.
      In accordance with the Information Technology Act 2000 and rules made thereunder, We have a Grievance Officer to address Your concerns regarding data safety, privacy, and the Platform usage concerns including complaints You have against other users on the Platform. We will resolve these issues raised by You within 30 (thirty) days from receiving them. You may contact the Grievance Officer at the following coordinates:
      Name: Joy Nair
      Address: Gamezop, Awfis, 1st Floor, L-29, Connaught Place, New Delhi 110 001
      Office Hours: 10 am – 7.30 pm (Mondays to Fridays)
      Email: joy@gamezop.com
  6. LIMITATIONS ON CONTESTANTS
    1. GENERAL
      2. Contestant undertakes to always follow the applicable Rules of the Contests. Any breach of the Rules or the Terms will automatically mean that the Contestant’s entry to the Contest is void and the Contestant will lose his / her entitlement to the Currencies or Tokens from any such entry.

      Gamezop reserves the right to declare a Contest void at any time.

      If the Contestant discovers a bug or any other error in the system, he / she must immediately log out from the Platform and write an email to help@gamezop.com. The Contestant shall not be entitled to any awards or Currencies as a result of a bug or error in the Platform.
    2. INVALID ENTRIES AND FORBIDDEN BEHAVIOUR
      1. Any use, or attempted use, of external gaming assistance programs, bots and software assistance with the purpose of giving the Contestant an unfair advantage is forbidden behavior, which will qualify as Cheating, and could result in the permanent suspension of the Contestant’s Account.
      2. Gamezop reserves the right to declare the entry of a Contestant void should it become evident that:
        1. It has been accepted on the grounds of an error. or
        2. The Contestant or third parties acting in cooperation with the Contestant jointly intend to evade the Agreement. or

    3. REFUNDDeposits added by the Contestants that remain unused on the Platform (“Unused Deposits) are refundable upon request. For any claims of refund the Contestant can only apply through an email addressed to help@gamezop.com.

      Further, such Unused Deposits will be compulsorily refunded to the Contestants on the 364th day from the day of Deposit, whether or not the Contestants claim this refund.

      For clarity, if the Contestant is unable to participate in a Paid Contest, after paying in Currencies or Tokens, due to any issue related to the Contestant’s device or internet connection, such Currencies or Tokens will not be refundable.

Examples of force majeure events are real or potential labour disputes, governmental actions, war or threat of war, sabotage, civil unrest, demonstrations, fire, storm, flooding, explosion, earthquake, provisions or limitations of materials or resources, inability to obtain the relevant authorization, accident, and defect in electricity or telecommunication network. User’s use of the Platform shall not be construed as the grant of any license or right to use any trademarks or names appearing on the Platform.
  11.   12. TERM AND TERMINATION
    1. Term: This Agreement is valid until further notice.
    2. Termination: Contestants whose Accounts have been suspended / terminated on the basis of the reasons cited below, will not be entitled to participate in any Contest until Gamezop at its sole discretion lifts such suspension / termination. Suspension can occur in relation to the entire Platform or certain sections of the Platform.
      1. Gamezop may at its sole discretion and without prior notice, suspend / terminate the Contestant’s access to the Platform if he / she violates or attempts to violate the security of the Platform including, without limitation:

        Violations of system or network security may result in civil or criminal liability. Gamezop will investigate occurrences that may involve such violations and cooperate with law enforcement authorities in prosecuting users who are involved in such violations. You agree not to use any device, software, or routine to interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper working of this platform, the games and contests on this platform, or any activity being conducted on this platform.
      2. Gamezop may at its sole discretion and without prior notice, suspend or terminate the Contestant’s Account under the following circumstances:
        1. Cheating, as defined under Section 5.6.3 and mentioned under Section 6.2.1.
        2. The Contestant violates any or all terms of this Agreement or instructions on the Platform;

  15. LEGAL ASPECTSGamezop only offers cash tournaments in Games of Skills (defined below). Gamezop does not support, endorse or offer to Contestants ‘games of chance’ for money.Participating in Games of Skill competitions for cash prizes is legal in all states of India except Andhra Pradesh, Assam, Nagaland, Odisha, Sikkim, Tamil Nadu, and Telangana.
  16. SEVERABILITYIf, for any reason, a court of competent jurisdiction finds any provision of the Terms, or portion thereof, to be unenforceable, that portion shall be enforced to the maximum extent permissible so as to give effect to the intent of the parties as reflected by that provision. The remainder of the Terms shall continue in full force and effect.
  17. WAIVERNo provision of the Agreement shall be deemed to be waived and no breach excused, unless such waiver or consent shall be in writing and signed by Gamezop. Any consent by Gamezop to, or a waiver by Gamezop of any breach by the User, whether expressed or implied, shall not constitute consent to, waiver of, or excuse for any other different or subsequent breach.
  18. GAMES OF SKILLA Game of Skill is a game where the outcome is determined mainly by mental or physical skill rather than by chance. Gamezop does not support, endorse or offer to Contestants ‘games of chance’ for money.It is the dominant element of skill or chance which determines the character of the game. The outcome or success in the Contests hosted on Gamezop platform is directly dependent on the Contestant’s effort, performance and skill. Contestant’s skill and knowledge of the Contest may be enhanced with practice. Additionally, Contests on the Platform have Rules and Contestants are encouraged to read, understand, and follow them.Different Contests will reward different skills, but each Contest will reward one or more skills, viz., knowledge of the game, familiarity with Rules, practice, hand-eye coordination, etc.The two main enactments dealing with gaming in India, are the pre-Independence Public Gambling Act, 1867 (“PGA”) and the Prize Competitions Act, 1955 (“PCA”) and both create a specific exception for Games of Skill.With respect to the PCA’s regulatory ambit, in the case of R. M. D. Chamarbaugwalla v. Union of India, the Supreme Court held that the only competitions that are sought to be controlled and regulated by the PCA are those in which success does not depend to any substantial degree of skill. Therefore, it ruled that games that are predominantly based on skill are excluded from the regulatory purview and penalising terms of the PCA. This position was reiterated in the case of News Television India Ltd. v. Ashok D. Waghmare where the Bombay High Court found the programme ‘Kaun Banega Crorepati’ to be based around a game of skill and not in violation of the PCA as it essentially required a participant to utilise his / her general knowledge and memory to provide answers to questions on various topics such as history, geography, sport, music, politics, cinema, science and technology, etc.

Business WebsiteGamezopTerms of UsePrivacy PolicyCookie PolicyCookie PolicyLast updated on 22 February 2021Advergame Technologies Private Limited uses cookies on . www.gamezop.com, www.gamezop.co, www.gamezop.in, www.gamezop.net, www.gamezoppro.com, www.gzp.gg, www.gamezop.io, www.gamezop.id, www.gamezop.mobi, www.gamezopapk.com, www.gamezop.us  (the “Service”). By using the Service, you consent to the use of cookies.Our Cookies Policy explains what cookies are, how we use cookies, how third-parties we may partner with may use cookies on the Service, your choices regarding cookies, and further information about cookies.What are cookies?Cookies are small pieces of text sent by your web browser by a website you visit. A cookie file is stored in your web browser and allows the Service or a third-party to recognize you and make your next visit easier and the Service more useful to you. Cookies can be “persistent” or “session” . cookies.How Advergame Technologies Private Limited uses cookies?When you use and access the Service, we may place a number of cookies files in your web browser.We use cookies for the following purposes: to enable certain functions of the Service, to provide analytics, to store your preferences, to enable advertisement delivery, including behavioral advertising.We use both session and persistent cookies on the Service and we use different types of cookies to run the Service. We use the following cookies on this website, for the following purposes:
  • Anonymous analytics cookies
  • Advertising cookies
  • Third-party cookies
Anonymous analytics cookiesWhen you visit our website, software provided by other organisations generates an “anonymous analytics cookie”. These cookies tell us whether you have visited the site before. Your browser will tell us if you have these cookies and, if you don’t, we generate new ones. This allows us to track how many individual users we have, and how often they visit the site. These cookies cannot allow us to identify individuals. We use them to gather statistics, for example, the number of visits to a page.Advertising cookiesThese cookies allow us to know whether you’ve seen an advertisement or a type of advertisement, and how long it is since you’ve seen it. We also use cookies to help us use targeted advertising. These cookies are anonymous – they store information about what you are looking at on our site, but not about who you are.Third-party cookiesIn addition to our own cookies, we may also use various third-parties cookies to report usage statistics of the Service, deliver advertisements on and through the Service, and so on.Google cookiesWe use Google Analytics on this website. Google Analytics generates statistical information about website use by using cookies, which are stored on your computer. The information generated relating to the Service is used by Google Analytics to create reports about the use of our websites. Google stores and uses this information. Google's privacy policy is available at:  http://www.google.com/privacypolicy.htmlAdvergame Technologies Private Limited publishes Google AdSense interest-based advertisements through its Service. These are specified by Google to reflect your interests. To determine this, Google will track your behaviour across the web using cookies.You can view, and edit the interests associated with your browser through Google's Ads Preference Manager, available at:  http://www.google.com/ads/preferences/.You can opt-out of the AdSense partner network cookie at: http://www.google.com/privacy_ads.html.However, this opt-out mechanism uses a cookie, and if you clear the cookies from your browser your opt-out will not be maintained. To ensure that an opt-out is maintained in respect of a particular browser, you should use the Google browser plug-in available at: http://www.google.com/ads/preferences/plugin.How do I turn cookies off?It is usually possible to stop your browser from accepting cookies, or to stop it from accepting cookies from a website. Please note, however, that if you delete cookies or refuse to accept them, you might not be able to use all the features we offer, you may not be able to store your preferences, and some of our pages might not display properly.All modern browsers allow you to change your cookie settings. You can usually find these settings in the Options or Preferences menu of your browser. To understand these settings, the following links may be helpful, or you can use the Help option in your browser for more details.
  • Cookie settings in Microsoft Edge
  • Cookie settings in Firefox
  • Cookie settings in Chrome
  • Cookie settings in Safari web and iOS.
If you are primarily concerned about third party cookies generated by advertisers, you can turn these off by going to the Your Online Choices site.Where can you find more information about cookies?You can learn more about cookies and the following third-party websites:
  • All About Cookies
  • Network Advertising Initiative

Business WebsiteGamezopTerms of UsePrivacy PolicyCookie PolicyPrivacy PolicyLast updated on 11 February 2021Advergame Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (“Gamezop” or “We”) is a private limited company incorporated under the Companies Act of India with registered office at Awfis, 1st Floor, L29, Connaught Place, Delhi – 110001, India. We offer a diverse, current, and exciting mix of online games created by Gamezop, as well as games created by independent developers.If you are reading this, it’s because you want to know what information we are collecting about users (“You”) on www.gamezop.com, www.gamezop.co, www.gamezop.in, www.gamezop.net, www.gamezoppro.com, www.gzp.gg, www.gamezop.io, www.gamezop.id, www.gamezop.mobi, www.gamezopapk.com, www.gamezop.us (“Sites”) and on Gamezop App (“App”), what we are doing with it, and what your options are. If you have any questions or concerns after reading this, please email us at privacy@gamezop.com.This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) applies to the services extended by the Gamezop Sites and App (“Services”). This Policy describes only our online information collection and use practices at the Sites and the App. it doesn’t apply to information we collect about you offline, such as over the phone or in person. By using our Services, you consent to this Policy.This Policy is effective as of 1st June, 2016. We reserve the right to amend the Policy and amendments will be effective as of the moment of publication on the Sites. You should check the Sites regularly for amendments.COLLECTING INFORMATION – WHEN AND WHAT
  • INFORMATION YOU PROVIDE:
    • While signing up: Your phone number and e-mail address when you register for Gamezop account or subscribe for our newsletter
    • While making profile: Name, picture, phone number, gender, age, location, etc.
    • While linking Social Network Services (“SNS”): Information from the SNS for which your grant us permission at the time of linking SNS with your account on Gamezop, in accordance with the terms of the SNS
    • While finding friends on Gamezop: If using your device's contacts list for this, Gamezop will access your contacts list to determine if someone in your contacts is using Gamezop. If using SNS, we will collect information in accordance with the terms of the SNS
    • While posting comments: Personally-identifying information, if any, posted during chats, posting comments on our forums, sending feedback, entering contests, etc.
Note that since some Gamezop software is served through a SNS, it is your responsibility to read and accept the terms and privacy policy of such SNS prior to continuing. Further, while you may choose to disclose information about yourself in our online chat rooms, forums, game comments, or in creating profiles. Information that you disclose in these areas is public information, and will be accessible to anyone who uses our Services. We are not responsible for the actions of any third parties with whom you share personally-identifiable information. Finally, you can always refuse to supply the aforementioned personally-identifying information, with the caveat that it may prevent you from engaging in certain activities on the Services.
  • INFORMATION WE TRACK:
    • From your activity: IP address (static or dynamic), browser type, browser language, referring/exit pages and URLs, other browser history, platform type, search terms, number of clicks, domain names, landing pages, pages viewed and the order of those pages, the amount of time spent on particular pages, the date and time, etc.
    • From your device: Type of device, advertising identifier, device identifiers (such as IMEI), operating system and version, carrier, language settings, geo-location, network type, (2G, 3G, 4G, WiFi), screen resolution, etc.
    • From cookies: Cookies are small text files a website can use to recognize a repeat visitor to the website. Both session cookies and persistent cookies maybe used
    • From third-party analytics: Reports on activity, game performance metrics, usage trends, demographic data from software (such as Google Analytics), which are integrated with our Services
If you do not want Gamezop to deploy cookies in your browser, you can opt out by setting your browser to reject cookies. If you choose to disable cookies in your browser, you can still use Gamezop Services, although your ability to use some of the features may be affected. By using the Services, you consent to our retaining all the above-described information in anonymous form as long as Gamezop sees fit.These third parties use cookies and other technologies to help analyze and provide us the data. You consent to the processing of data about you by these analytics providers in the manner and for the purposes set out in this Policy. For more information on the third party, including how to opt out from certain data collection, please visit the site below. Please be advised that if you opt out of any service, you may not be able to use the full functionality of the Services.For Google Analytics, please visit: www.google.com/analyticsREASONS FOR COLLECTING INFORMATIONWe use personal details and other information to maintain the general and personified content and functionality of the Services. In addition, we use personal details to make it possible to accommodate your requests, and so that we are able to provide you with service when using our Services and for the purposes set out elsewhere in this Policy. More specifically, it may be used for one of the following:
  • To personalize your experience and make bespoke recommendations
  • To help you efficiently access your information and the progress each time you use our Services
  • To improve or add to our Services based on the information and feedback we receive from you
  • To administer a contest, promotion, survey, etc. or to maintain record of our dealings with you
  • To help you to connect with your friends from SNS or device’s contacts on our Services
  • To analyze and draw trend reports from aggregated statistics of user activity
  • To send periodic emails for sharing information and updates pertaining to your order, occasional company news, updates, related product or service information, etc.
SHARING YOUR INFORMATION
  • WITH EMPLOYEES, CONTRACTORS, AND AFFILIATED ORGANIZATIONS: Strictly on a need-to-know basis in order to process it on Gamezop’s behalf or to facilitate smooth functioning of our Services, such as providing network services, IT support, and customer service.
  • WITH THIRD PARTIES: Such that they may provide you information about the products and services they offer.
  • WITH PARENT COMPANY, SUBSIDIARY, INVESTOR, OR ACQUIRER: In the event of corporate sale, merger, reorganization, sale of assets, dissolution, or bankruptcy, your information maybe part of the transferred assets.
  • WITH REGULATORY AUTHORITIES: When required by court order, law enforcement authority, or regulatory agencies, or whenever we believe that disclosing such information is necessary to protect the rights, property, or safety of Gamezop, its Services, users, or the public at large
The aforementioned persons are contractually restricted from using or disclosing the information except as necessary to perform services on our behalf.All Information, including your personally identifiable information, may be maintained on servers or databases located outside your country or to a jurisdiction where the privacy laws may not be the same as those in your location. By using our Services you consent to the transfer of such information to them.PROTECTING YOUR INFORMATIONWe follow generally accepted industry security standards to safeguard and help prevent unauthorized access, maintain data security, and correctly use your personal information. However, no commercial method of information transfer over the Internet or electronic data storage is known to be 100% secure. As a result, Gamezop cannot guarantee the absolute security of that information during its transmission or its storage in our systems. Be advised that if you send messages or post material containing personal information, that information may be collected and used by others.Upon termination of your account, we will remove your profile and other personal information from view. We, however, may (but are not obligated to) keep information about you that is on our system following your termination. You understand and acknowledge that, even after removal, copies of personal data or content may remain viewable in cached and archived pages, or if other users have copied or stored your personal data or content.YOUR OPTIONS
  • COST FREE INFORMATION: The right to cost-free information about the personal data stored in regard to your person. Furthermore, you have a right, subject to the statutory provisions, to have such personal data corrected, blocked, and deleted. We may, however, decline to process requests that are unreasonably repetitive, require disproportionate technical effort, jeopardize the privacy of others, are extremely impractical, or for which access is not otherwise required by local law.
  • UNSUBSCRIBING FROM EMAIL COMMUNICATIONS: If you are receiving Gamezop email advertisements and no longer wish to receive those email messages, you may opt out at the time you receive the message by following the instructions in that email. Please allow ten days for your request to be processed. However, you may not opt out of service-related communications (e.g., account verification, changes/updates to features of the Services, technical and security notices, etc.).
  • IMITING SCOPE OF SHARING INFORMATION: In event of disagreement with terms of this Policy, it may be best to limit your level of interaction with us, which could include simply not providing us with personal information. Recognize that not consenting or withdrawing consent may limit or preclude use of the Services.
MISCELLANEOUS
  • CHILDREN’S ONLINE PRIVACY PROTECTION ACT (“COPPA”): We desire and strive to comply with the requirements of the COPPA, which was established to protect children’s online privacy. COPPA requires that operators of online services (such as ours) adhere to specific guidelines regarding the collection and handling of personal information about children under the age of 13.
    Gamezop is not directed at children and does not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from anyone under the age of 13 or knowingly allow such persons to register or participate in our Services. If you are under 13, please do not attempt to register for our Services or send any information about yourself to us, including your name, address, telephone number, or email address. No one under age 13 may provide any personal information to Gamezop. In the event that we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under age 13 we will take all reasonable measures to delete that information as quickly as possible and to not use such information for any purpose (except where necessary to protect the safety of the child or others as required or allowed by law).
    We encourage parents and legal guardians to monitor their children’s internet usage and to help enforce our Policy by instructing their children to never provide personal information to the operators of online services. If you have reason to believe that a child under the age of 13 has provided personal information to us without such parental consent, please contact us.
  • EXTERNAL WEBSITES / THIRD-PARTY LINKS / ADVERTISERS: We may include or offer third party products or services on our website. These third parties may use cookies, pixel tags (also called web beacons or clear gifs), and other technologies to collect information for such purposes. Pixel tags enable recognizing a browser's cookie when a browser visits the site on which the beacon is located, and to learn which banner ads bring users to a given site. Similarly, ads appearing on any of our Services may be delivered to users by advertising partners, who may set cookies. This information allows ad networks to, among other things, deliver targeted advertisements that they believe will be of most interest to you.
    This Policy covers the use of cookies by Gamezop and does not cover the use of cookies by any third-parties. We have no control over the privacy practices or the content of any of our business partners, advertisers, sponsors, or other websites to which we provide links. As such, we are not responsible for the content or the privacy policies of those third-party websites. You should check the applicable third-party privacy policy and terms of use when visiting any other websites. Nonetheless, we seek to protect the integrity of our Services and welcome any feedback about these sites.
  • GOVERNING LAW: This Policy and the relationship between Gamezop and you hereto shall be governed by, and interpreted in accordance with, the laws of India without having regard to the conflict of law’s provisions thereunder. The courts of New Delhi, India, shall have exclusive jurisdiction over all matters arising pursuant to this Policy.
  • AGGREGATED STATISTICS: Gamezop may collect statistics about the behavior of users to its Services. When in the aggregate form and not pointing to a particular individual, we may display this information publicly or provide it to others.
  • BUSINESS TRANSFERS: If Gamezop, or substantially all of our assets, were acquired, or in the unlikely event that we go out of business or enter bankruptcy, user information would be one of the assets that is transferred or acquired by a third party. You acknowledge that such transfers may occur, and that any acquirer of Gamezop may continue to use your personal information as set forth in this Policy.
  • CHANGES TO THIS POLICY: We reserve the right to amend the Policy and amendments will be effective as of the moment of publication on the Websites. You should check the Websites regularly for amendments. Your continued use of our Services after any change in this Policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.
CONTACT DETAILSIf there are any questions with regard to this Policy, you may contact us using the following information:
Mail: Advergame Technologies Pvt. Ltd. Gamezop, Awfis, 1st Floor, L29, Connaught Place, New Delhi – 110001 India
Email: privacy@gamezop.com
